page.title: 19OUT OF SCHOOL ACTIVITIES
page.content: THE PUPILS IN OUR CLASS ARE INVOLVED IN LOTS OF ACTIVITIES OUT OF SCHOOL,BOTH INDOORS AND OUT. MOST OF OUR CLASS ARE INTERESTED IN {ROLLER}OR{ICE SKATING}AND MANY HAVE JOINED A SKATING CLUB. {SCOUTS,GUIDES,CUBS AND BROWNIES} ARE VERY POPULAR.FIFTEEN PEOPLE OUT OF NINETEEN IN OUR CLASS ARE IN THE SCOUTING MOVEMENT. ONLY ONE PERSON HAS{BALLET}LESSONS ALTHOUGH QUITE A LOT OF GIRLS HAVE HAD LESSONS IN THE PAST. TWO CHILDREN GO TO{B.M.X.CLUBS}AND RACE THEIR BIKES. FIVE PEOPLE ARE REGULAR MEMBERS OF {DISCOS}OR{YOUTH CLUBS. ONE PERSON PRACTICES THREE OF THE {MARTIAL ARTS}. TWO BOYS ARE INTERESTED IN{CRICKET BUT NEARLY ALL THE BOYS AND SOME OF THE GIRLS, LIKE{FOOTBALL.
